reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, cute, and comfortable, with good quality that can be dressed up or down. The garment fits well and is true to size, with one customer noting its cuffed sleeves. They love the color, and one mentions wearing it with brown gingham pants.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as pictured!
items.body: So so cute. Soft, comfortable, true to size, and exactly as pictured. The sleeves are the perfect touch to dress it up. Read more
items.author: Emily Adams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brown is the color of choice this fall
items.body: Perfect Thanksgiving dinner outfit, worn with brown gingham pants. Very soft and tts, and the sale price was a bonus. Read more
items.author: Gina W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softer than expected! Super flattering
items.body: Love this sweater! Super softer and comfy. More so than I expected. Very flattering. Iâ€™m postpartum, 5â€™9 and maybe 150 lbs and got a large. Itâ€™s loose for breastfeeding but still looks nice and like I tried to get ready. Havenâ€™t washed it yet so will see how the material handles that. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thanksgiving chic
items.body: I really love this Cicy Bell oversized sweater! The crewneck and ruffle puff sleeves give it such a sweet, feminine touch while still feeling trendy and modern. The knit is soft and comfortable, perfect for chilly fall days or layering under a coat. Itâ€™s oversized without feeling sloppy, so it still looks put-together with jeans or leggings. My only tiny complaint is that the sleeves are a bit long, but itâ€™s nothing a quick cuff canâ€™t fix. Overall, this sweater is cozy, cute, and definitely gets noticed Iâ€™ve already worn it a few times and received compliments each time! I do kind of think I look like a turkey in this because the sleeves but it is perfect for thanksgiving! Read more
items.author: Sara Clark

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Lightweight, But Too Boxy for Me
items.body: The material on this sweater is soft and lightweight, which makes it great for layering or for mild weather. I also really liked the cinched arms and think they add a cute touch. That said, the overall fit was too boxy on me, and it just didnâ€™t sit right. It might work better if youâ€™re going for a relaxed, oversized look, but it wasnâ€™t flattering on my frame. Returning it, but still giving 3 stars for the softness and quality. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized sweater
items.body: I just received my oversized sweater.must say itâ€™s just as seen on the photo . I purchased size medium it fits perfectly. Love the color . The material is a little see through. . Iâ€™ll wear a tank top underneath. Something to consider.but over all a nice sweater to dress up or down . Read more
items.author: liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater! Super soft and comfy
items.body: Love this sweater! Great for our Christmas dinner out with friends. Read more
items.author: Florida Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: I love this sweater top.The texture is so soft and good quality.It does not have any lints and it blended so well with my skin. It gives me fall intoðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Blessed Eve

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, White, Blue, Yellow, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
